Reviews.Title: Performance exceeds price !!
Reviews.Author: parker
Reviews.Content: Pros: Easy to install and configure. Web interface, iPhone app, Android app. You can look at the cameras from anywhere. 2 Terabyte Hard drive placed in the package. With high quality resolution it gave about 30 days of recording time for 8 cameras. All needed is in the box.Cons: Menu is a bit complicated.Other Thoughts: This is a perfect DIY Package for the price. It offers much more that you would expect for this price. Web interface, client interface and mobile interface - all works.

ProductInfo.Features:
Connection type: 12 RJ12 and 4 BNC ports
Cameras have a built in microphone for audio monitoring capability
View and access live and recorded video remotely over the internet or mobile phone
Cameras lens: 3.6mm, Resolution: 600 TV lines
Hard Drive: 2TB, LED lighting distance: max 80ft
ProductInfo.Name: Revo R164D8EM21-2T 16-Channel 2TB DVR Surveillance System with 8 600TVL 80-Feet Night Vision Dome Cameras (White and Black)
